input_text:
Job Title: Tax Associate

Location: Topeka Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Position: Tax Associate

Department: Finance

Reporting to: Tax Specialist

Location: Onsite; Topeka KS

Overview

We are looking for a detail orientated individual to join our Finance team. As a Tax Associate, you will assist with a wide variety of accounting and tax related responsibilities. Primary duties include preparing sales tax returns, annual reports, and 1099’s for multiple entities.

What You’ll Do

Preparation of sales tax returns in multiple states for multiple entitiesPreparation of annual reports in multiple states for multiple entitiesPrepare mailings for quarterly and annual tax filingsAssist with preparing tax payments and updating spreadsheets related to tax filings

Experience You’ll Bring

Time management and ability to handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environmentDetail oriented, motivated, dependable, and quality orientedStrong organizational skills: capacity to manage heavy workload while navigating a variety of competing, ever-changing prioritiesExceptional problem determination skills with a high attention to detailAbility to working independently, but also as a collaborative team memberStrong knowledge of MS Office, including Word, Excel and Outlook

Bonus Points

Bachelor’s DegreePrevious accounting/bookkeeping experiencePrevious professional experience

What You’ll Get

Amazing benefits including medical, dental, vision and 401k (with matching options)Generous PTO package upon your start dateAccess to an on-site café, gym and primary care physicianContinuous personal and professional development opportunitiesRecognition for hard work & exemplary performanceEmployee sponsored events…and more!

Who We Are

Advisors Excel is a fast paced, innovative company that seeks to service independent financial advisors in a multitude of areas within their business. From operational functions, to sales and marketing, our end goal is to help continually grow advisors’ businesses nationwide. We thrive on watching them succeed. Not only does AE want to see the success of our advisors, but also our employees. We have high expectations from them to continually move our business forward. We are on the hunt for positive people who thrive on hard work and in a collaborative team environment. If this sounds like you, then what are you waiting for? We want you to join our team!

Advisors Excel is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. Everyone is welcome here – as an inclusive workplace, our employees are always comfortable bringing their true selves to our offices daily.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Tax Associate
output_json.summary: Join our Finance team as a detail-oriented Tax Associate responsible for various accounting and tax tasks.
job_responsibilities: Preparation of sales tax returns in multiple states
Preparation of annual reports in multiple states
Assistance with quarterly and annual tax filings
output_json.company_information: Advisors Excel is a fast-paced, innovative company focused on supporting independent financial advisors through various business functions, including operations, sales, and marketing. The company aims to foster growth and success for both its advisors and employees.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Advisors Excel is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer, welcoming all candidates regardless of background.
